recipes.name: Rice
instructions: Rinse the rice thoroughly under running water.
Bring water to a boil in a medium-sized pot.
Add rice, salt, and oil (if using) to the boiling water.
Reduce heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the water is absorbed.
Turn off the heat and let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Pasta
instructions: Fill a large pot with water and bring it to a boil.
Add salt and olive oil to the boiling water.
Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
Drain the pasta and serve with your favorite sauce.

recipes.name: Scrambled Eggs
instructions: Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
Pour in the egg mixture and gently stir until curds form.
Cook until eggs are softly scrambled, then serve.

recipes.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
instructions: Butter one side of each bread slice.
Place one slice, butter side down, on a skillet over medium heat.
Add cheese and top with the second slice, butter side up.
Grill until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted.

recipes.name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, sugar, and baking powder in a bowl.
Whisk in egg, milk, and melted butter until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium heat.
Pour batter onto the griddle and cook until bubbles form, then flip and cook until golden.

recipes.name: French Toast
instructions: Beat eggs, milk, and vanilla together in a shallow bowl.
Dip bread slices into the mixture, coating both sides.
Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Cook bread slices until golden brown on both sides.

recipes.name: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
In a bowl, combine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
Drizzle Caesar dressing and toss well before serving.

recipes.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
instructions: Heat olive oil in a wok over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add broccoli, bell peppers, and carrot, stirring constantly.
Pour in soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender yet crisp.

recipes.name: Chicken Soup
instructions: In a large pot, sauté onions until translucent.
Add chicken and cook until lightly browned.
Add carrots, celery, and chicken broth.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer until chicken is cooked and vegetables are tender.

recipes.name: Beef Stew
instructions: Brown beef cubes in a large pot over medium heat.
Add onions and cook until softened.
Stir in beef broth, potatoes, carrots, thyme, salt, and pepper.
Simmer on low heat for 1-2 hours until beef is tender.

recipes.name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Sauté onions in a pot until softened.
Add curry powder and stir for 1 minute.
Mix in cauliflower, potatoes, peas, and coconut milk.
Simmer until vegetables are tender and flavors meld.

recipes.name: Fried Rice
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan over medium-high heat.
Add garlic and mixed vegetables, stir-fry for 3 minutes.
Push vegetables aside and scramble the eggs in the same pan.
Mix in cooked rice and soy sauce, stir-fry until heated through.

recipes.name: Omelette
instructions: Beat the eggs with salt and pepper in a bowl.
Melt butter in a skillet over medium heat.
Add onions and bell peppers, sauté until soft.
Pour in eggs and cook until set, then fold and serve.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Sauté onions and garlic until soft in a pan.
Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Stir in diced tomatoes, Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper; simmer for 15 minutes.
Serve sauce over spaghetti.

recipes.name: Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning with a little water and simmer.
Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Guacamole
instructions: Scoop out avocado flesh into a bowl.
Mash with a fork until creamy.
Stir in onion, tomato, lime juice, salt, and pepper.
Mix well and serve with tortilla chips.

recipes.name: Mashed Potatoes
instructions: Boil potatoes until tender.
Drain and mash potatoes with butter and milk.
Season with salt and pepper, and serve warm.

recipes.name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Rinse quinoa and cook with water until fluffy.
In a bowl, combine quinoa, tomatoes, and cucumber.
Whisk olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; pour over salad.
Toss well and chill before serving.

recipes.name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and sauté onions and garlic.
Add tomatoes and cook until softened.
Pour in vegetable broth and simmer for 20 minutes.
Blend the mixture until smooth and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Chili Con Carne
instructions: Brown ground beef with onions and garlic in a pot.
Add diced tomatoes, kidney beans, and chili powder.
Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Season with salt and serve hot.

recipes.name: Veggie Burger
ingredients: 1 can black beans, drained and mashed
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and mix well.
Form into patties.
Cook in a lightly oiled skillet over medium heat until browned on both sides.
Serve on a bun with desired toppings.

recipes.name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a pan and sauté onions and garlic.
Add chicken pieces and brown on all sides.
Stir in curry powder and cook for 2 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and serve with rice.

recipes.name: Fish Tacos
instructions: Season fish with salt and pepper and cook in olive oil until flaky.
Warm tortillas in a skillet.
Assemble tacos with fish, shredded cabbage, and a squeeze of lime.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken
instructions: Preheat the grill to medium-high heat.
Brush chicken with olive oil and season with paprika, garlic powder, salt, and pepper.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes on each side until fully cooked.
Let rest for a few minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Roast Beef
instructions: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Rub beef with olive oil, garlic, rosemary, salt, and pepper.
Place in a roasting pan and cook for 1.5 to 2 hours until desired doneness.
Let rest before slicing and serving.

recipes.name: Baked Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
Place salmon on a lined baking tray, drizzle with olive oil, and season with salt and pepper.
Top with lemon slices and dill if using.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until salmon is cooked through.

recipes.name: Garlic Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix butter, garlic, and parsley in a bowl.
Slice the baguette and spread the garlic butter on each slice.
Bake for 10 minutes until crisp and golden.

recipes.name: Cucumber Salad
instructions: Combine cucumbers and red onion in a bowl.
Mix vinegar, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a small bowl.
Pour dressing over vegetables and toss gently.
Refrigerate for 30 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: Beef Burgers
instructions: Mix ground beef with chopped onion, salt, and pepper.
Form into 4 patties.
Grill patties over medium-high heat for 5-7 minutes on each side.
Assemble burgers with buns and desired toppings.

recipes.name: Caprese Salad
instructions: Arrange tomato and mozzarella slices alternately on a plate.
Top with basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil and balsamic glaze over the salad.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

recipes.name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Heat butter and olive oil in a skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic and sauté until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Stir in white wine and lemon juice; simmer for 2 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, garnish with parsley, and serve.

recipes.name: Stuffed Peppers
ingredients: 4 bell peppers, tops cut and seeded
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Sauté onion and ground meat until cooked.
Mix in cooked rice and diced tomatoes; season with salt and pepper.
Fill each pepper with the mixture and place in a baking dish.
Cover with foil and bake for 30-35 minutes.

recipes.name: Meatloaf
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix all ingredients in a bowl until well combined.
Shape the mixture into a loaf and place in a baking pan.
Bake for 45-50 minutes until cooked through, then let it rest before slicing.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C) and grease a loaf pan.
Mix mashed bananas with melted butter and egg in a bowl.
Stir in flour, sugar, baking soda, and salt until just combined.
Pour into the loaf pan and bake for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cream butter with sugars until light and fluffy.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt, then stir in chocolate chips.
Drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes.

recipes.name: Lemonade
instructions: In a pitcher, combine lemon juice and sugar.
Stir until the sugar dissolves.
Add water and mix well.
Serve over ice.

recipes.name: Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend frozen banana, berries, yogurt, and milk until smooth.
Pour into a bowl and top with granola, sliced fruits, and a drizzle of honey.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture on the toast.
Sprinkle red pepper flakes on top if desired.

recipes.name: Waffles
instructions: Preheat your waffle iron.
Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt in a bowl.
Whisk in eggs, milk, and oil until smooth.
Pour batter onto the waffle iron and cook until golden brown.

recipes.name: Rice Pilaf
instructions: Sauté diced onion in butter until translucent.
Add rice and stir for 2 minutes.
Pour in broth and bring to a boil.
Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until rice is tender.
Fluff with a fork and serve.

recipes.name: Fried Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken pieces in buttermilk for at least 2 hours.
Mix flour, paprika, salt, and pepper in a bowl.
Dredge chicken in the flour mixture until coated.
Fry in hot oil until golden brown and cooked through.

recipes.name: Egg Salad
instructions: Combine chopped eggs, mayonnaise, and mustard in a bowl.
Mix until well combined.
Season with salt, pepper, and add chives if using.
Serve chilled on bread or as a side dish.

recipes.name: Cobb Salad
instructions: Arrange mixed greens on a plate.
Top with sliced chicken, eggs, avocado, tomato, and blue cheese.
Drizzle with your favorite dressing and serve.

recipes.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.
In a saucepan, melt butter and add heavy cream over medium heat.
Stir in Parmesan cheese until melted and smooth.
Combine pasta with the sauce, season with salt and pepper, and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Risotto
ingredients: 4 cups chicken or vegetable broth, warmed
instructions: Sauté onion in butter until translucent in a large pan.
Add Arborio rice and stir for 2 minutes.
Pour in white wine and let it absorb.
Gradually add warm broth, stirring constantly until the rice is creamy and al dente.
Stir in Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper.

recipes.name: Pesto Pasta
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a food processor, blend basil, pine nuts, Parmesan, garlic, olive oil, and salt until smooth.
Toss pasta with the pesto sauce and serve.

recipes.name: Baked Ziti
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Cook ziti pasta according to package instructions.
Mix pasta with marinara sauce and ricotta cheese.
Transfer to a baking dish, top with mozzarella and Parmesan.
Bake for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly.

recipes.name: Greek Salad
instructions: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, red onion, olives, and feta in a bowl.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Season with salt and oregano, toss gently, and serve chilled.

recipes.name: Samosas
instructions: Mix flour, oil, and water to form a dough; let it rest.
Prepare filling by mixing mashed potatoes, peas, garam masala, cumin seeds, and salt.
Roll out dough and cut into small circles, fill with the mixture, and fold into triangles.
Deep fry until golden brown and serve hot.

recipes.name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water until softened.
Heat oil in a wok and scramble the eggs.
Add shrimp or tofu and cook until done.
Stir in noodles, fish sauce, and tamarind paste; toss well.
Mix in bean sprouts and green onions, garnish with peanuts, and serve with lime wedges.
